entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning early in the evening. Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain overnight. Ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
